title: Transactional Shell-Based Language Courseware Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Language Learning Theories and Experience in Educational Administration
context.additional_context: A customized language education solution for advanced learners in managerial/leadership roles, optimized for mobile learning in smartphone-centric, resource-constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more language learning strategies using a transactional shell system.
Learners can develop two complete language coursewares by applying content to predefined templates.
Learners can iteratively improve courseware prototypes three or more times by incorporating peer feedback in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
